page.title: 05THE MODERN SKELMORLIE
page.content: Local industries such as Inverkip Power Station, Hunterston Ore Terminal, International Business Machines,all expanded about 1965 bringing an increase in the local population .Many new houses were built in groups or individually and new local authority houses were also built.THe village was now a dormitory village for areas both North and South. The incoming population was not local and brought many new ideas to the community. But the newcomers and older residents soon mixed and worked together for the good of the community One of the things the village needed was a new school and the villagers petitioned for and were given a new school in 1975.
